title: Spinnaker Trust Acquires 125,227 Shares of SPDR S&P Fossil Fuel Reserves Free ETF $SPYX
description: Spinnaker Trust raised its stake in shares of SPDR S&P Fossil Fuel Reserves Free ETF (NYSEARCA:SPYX – Free Report) by 41.9% during the 3rd quarter, HoldingsChannel reports. title: Dinosaurs for sale: Is the global fossil market harming science?
description: In a two-part special, 101 East explores Asia’s role in the booming multimillion-dollar dinosaur fossil trade.
